Name: Mod Settings
Description:
Helper mod for other mods to provide settings for the player. It doesn't do anything on its own, but may be required by some mods.

If you are a modder, check out source code and examples on GitHub: https://github.com/eMkaQQ/timberborn-modding

Disclaimer: although I work for Mechanistry and I'm one of the developers of Timberborn, this mod is my personal creation, made independently of my job. It shouldn't be considered official game content nor associated with Mechanistry in any way.
